id.description: User ID, should be unique across all user.

username.description: Username, used to log into the system. Should be unique across all user.

display_name.description: The user's name, to be displayed on the UI.

UserPassword.description: The password of an user in the system.

Token.description: A token that allow the user to be authenticated to the system.

UserRole.description: A role in the system, which may contain some UserPermission that allows the user to operate on the system.

id.description: User role ID, should be unique across all user role.

display_name.description: The user role's name, to be displayed on the UI.

description.description: A short description about the user role.

UserPermission.description: A permission in the system, allowing the user to operate certain features on the system.

id.description: User permission ID, should be unique across all user role.

permission_name.description: The permission name. Should only contain letter, number, underscore (_) and dot (.). Dots should be used to separate the namespace of the permission, allowing easy organization of the permission, such as user.manage, image.view, etc...

description.description: A short description about the user permission.

ImageType.description: An image type for images on the system. The type of an image determines which tags the image can be assigned with and which labels the regions on that image can take.

id.description: Image type ID, should be unique across all image type.

display_name.description: The image type's name, to be displayed on the UI.

has_predictive_model.description: If true, the system can automatically detect regions on images of this type. This value should only be set manually by the developers.

RegionLabel.description: A label that a region on an image can take. Each RegionLabel is associated with one ImageType only.

id.description: Region label ID, should be unique across all label.

display_name.description: The region label's name, to be displayed on the UI.

color.description: The color for regions assigned with this label.

ImageTagGroup.description: A group of tag values. If an Image Tag Group is associated with an Image Type, images of that Image Type can be assigned with Tag values of that Image Tag Group.

id.description: Image tag group ID, should be unique across all tag group.

display_name.description: The image tag group's name, to be displayed on the UI.

is_single_value.description: If true, each image can only be assigned with one tag of this tag group. Otherwise, multiple tags of this group can be assigned to the same image.

ImageTag.description: A tag value, that can be assigned to an image for classification purpose.

id.description: Image tag ID, should be unique across all tag.

display_name.description: The image tag's name, to be displayed on the UI.

id.description: Image ID, should be unique across all image.

upload_time.description: The time when this image was uploaded to the system.

publish_time.description: The time when this image was published for other users to verify.

verify_time.description: The time when this image was marked as verified.

original_file_name.description: The original file name of the image, when uploaded by the user.

image_url.description: The URL to the full-size image on the system.

thumbnail_url.description: The URL to the compressed small-size thumbnail of the image, for display purpose.

status.description: The status of the image on the system. Can take a value of 0 (UPLOADED - for images that are just uploaded to the system), 1 (PUBLISHED - for images that are published for other users to verify), 2 (VERIFIED - for images that are verified by other users) or 3 (EXCLUDED - for images that are excluded from publication and are intended for presentation only).

Polygon.description: A polygon on a 2D plane. Polygons are represented by an array of its vertices - two consecutive elements of the array, as well as the first and the last element of the array share an edge together.

Region.description: A region on an image on the system.

id.description: Region ID, should be unique across all region.

holes.description: The holes inside the border of the region. Holes cannot intersect with each other, and cannot intersect with the border of the region.

RegionOperationLog.description: A log of operations on a region.

id.description: Log ID, should be unique across all log.

operation_time.description: The time when this operation took place.

operation_type.description: The type of operation. Can take a value of 0 (DRAW - for operations where the user draws/redraws the border/holes of the region) or 1 (LABEL - for operations where the user assign a label for the region).

operation_metadata.description: Metadata of the operation. For DRAW operations, this is a RegionOperationLogDrawMetadata object. For LABEL operations, this is a RegionOperationLogLabelMetadata object.

RegionOperationLogDrawMetadata.description: Metadata for DRAW operation on a Region.

old_holes.description: The list of holes in the region before the operation.

new_holes.description: The list of holes in the region after the operation.

RegionOperationLogLabelMetadata.description: Metadata for LABEL operation on a Region.

400.description: Failed to create user because the username or display name does not satisfy the constraints.

409.description: Failed to create user because the username has already been taken.

get.description: Get user list. User needs to have `users.manage` permission in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first item to be returned.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be returned.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The order to return items in. Can be either 0 (sorted by ascending id), 1 (sorted by descending id), 2 (sorted by ascending username) or 3 (sorted by descending username), 4 (sorted by ascending display name) or 5 (sorted by descending display name).

parameters.name: with_user_role
parameters.description: If equal to 1, will return the list of user roles each user in the list has.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

user_role_list.description: If with_user_role = 1, this field is the list of user roles each user in user_list has, in the same order. If with_user_role = 0, this field is not returned.

400.description: Failed to retrieve user list because the arguments provideds does not satisfy the constraints.

401.description: Failed to retrieve user list because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to retrieve user list because the user does not have the necessary permission.

patch.description: Update user information. User needs to have `users.manage` permission in order to call this API to update other user's information successfully. Any field that is not provided in the request will not be updated.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user whose information will be updated.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

401.description: Failed to update user because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to update user because the user does not have the necessary permission.

409.description: Failed to update user because the username has already been taken.

post.description: Login with password. If the user is successfully logged in, an authorization token is included in the response as a cookie, allowing the user to operate on the system.

username.description: Username, used to log into the system. Should be unique across all user.

password.description: The password of an user in the system.

Authorization.description: Authentication token for the newly created user.

401.description: Failed to log user in because of incorrect password.

404.description: Failed to log user in because there is no user with the provided username.

post.description: Upload a new image to the system. User needs to have `images.upload` permission in order to call this API successfully.

400.description: Failed to upload image because any of the information provided does not satisfy the constraints.

401.description: Failed to upload image because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to upload image because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to upload image because image_type_id is provided and image type with image_type_id does not exist, or image_tag_id_list is provided and the image tags with those IDs do not exist.

409.description: Failed to upload image because image_type_id is provided, but the list of image tag IDs provided in the request is not allowed for the image type.

patch.description: Update image list. This feature only allows mass updating of image type. For every image in the request, user needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is updating an image of their own, or (2) have `images.manage.all` permission and is updating an image that they are allowed to edit in order to call this API successfully.

image_id_list.description: The list of image to be updated.

200.description: The image list is updated successfully.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

400.description: Failed to update image list because any of the information provided does not satisfy the constraints.

401.description: Failed to update image list because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to update image list because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to update image list because one or more images in the provided list, or the image type with image_type_id does not exist.

delete.description: Delete image list. For every image in the request, user needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is deleting an image of their own, or (2) have `images.manage.all` permission and is deleting an image that they are allowed to edit in order to call this API successfully.

image_id_list.description: The list of image to be deleted.

200.description: The image list is updated successfully.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

400.description: Failed to delete image list because any of the information provided does not satisfy the constraints.

401.description: Failed to delete image list because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to delete image list because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to delete image list because one or more images in the provided list does not exist.

get.description: Get image list uploaded by the current sessions's user. User needs to have `images.manage.self` permission in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first item to be returned.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be returned.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The order to return items in. Can be either 0 (sorted by ascending id), 1 (sorted by descending id), 2 (sorted by ascending upload time), 3 (sorted by descending upload time), 4 (sorted by ascending publish time), 5 (sorted by descending publish time), 6 (sorted by ascending verify time), 7 (sorted by descending verify time).

parameters.name: filter_image_types
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of image type IDs. If provided, filter for images that belong to one of these image types.

parameters.name: filter_image_tags
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of image tag IDs. If provided, filter for images that has one of these image tags (or all of these image tags, if must_match_all_image_tags = 1).

parameters.name: filter_region_labels
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of region label IDs. If provided, filter for images that has one of these region labels (or all of these region labels, if must_match_all_region_labels = 1).

parameters.name: filter_published_by_user_ids
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of user IDs. If provided, filter for images that are published by one of these users.

parameters.name: filter_verified_by_user_ids
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of user IDs. If provided, filter for images that are verified by one of these users.

parameters.name: filter_upload_time_start
parameters.description: If non-zero, filter for images that are uploaded from or after this timestamp.

parameters.name: filter_upload_time_end
parameters.description: If non-zero, filter for images that are uploaded before or on this timestamp.

parameters.name: filter_publish_time_start
parameters.description: If non-zero, filter for images that are published from or after this timestamp.

parameters.name: filter_publish_time_end
parameters.description: If non-zero, filter for images that are published before or on this timestamp.

parameters.name: filter_verify_time_start
parameters.description: If non-zero, filter for images that are verified from or after this timestamp.

parameters.name: filter_verify_time_end
parameters.description: If non-zero, filter for images that are verified before or on this timestamp.

parameters.name: original_file_name_query
parameters.description: If provided, filter for images that have original name containing this query string (case insensitive).

parameters.name: must_match_all_image_tags
parameters.description: If equal to 1, images in the results must have all image tags provided in the filter.

parameters.name: must_match_all_region_labels
parameters.description: If equal to 1, images in the results must have all region labels provided in the filter.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

total_image_count.description: The total number of images meeting the filter condition.

image_list.description: The list of images meeting the filter condition, in the requested page.

image_tag_list.description: The list of image tags each image in image_list has, in the same order.

400.description: Failed to retrieve image list because one or more of the arguments provided is invalid.

401.description: Failed to update image because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to update image because the user does not have the necessary permission.

get.description: Get an image. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is getting an image of their own, (2) have `images.verify` permission and is getting an image with PUBLISHED status that they are allowed to verify, or (3) have `images.manage.all` permission and is updating an image that they are allowed to manage in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to be retrieved.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

image_tag_list.description: The list of tags this image is assigned with.

region_list.description: The list of regions in this image.

401.description: Failed to retrieve image because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to retrieve image because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to retrieve image because the image with image_id does not exist.

patch.description: Update image metadata. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is updating an image of their own, (2) have `images.verify` permission and is updating an image with PUBLISHED status that they are allowed to verify, or (3) have `images.manage.all` permission and is updating an image that they are allowed to edit in order to call this API successfully. Any field that is not provided in the request will not be updated.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to be updated.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

image_tag_list.description: The list of tags this image is assigned with.

region_list.description: The list of regions in this image.

400.description: Failed to update image because the provided information does not satisfy the constraints.

401.description: Failed to update image because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to update image because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to update image because the image with image_id does not exist.

delete.description: Delete image. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is updating an image of their own, or (2) have `images.manage.all` permission in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to be updated.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

401.description: Failed to delete image because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to delete image because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to delete image because the image with image_id does not exist.

get.description: Get all region snapshots of an image at a certain status. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is getting an image of their own, (2) have `images.verify` permission and is getting an image with PUBLISHED status that they are allowed to verify, or (3) have `images.manage.all` permission and is updating an image that they are allowed to manage in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to be retrieved.

200.description: Retrieved region snapshot list of image successfully.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

region_list.description: The list of region snapshots in this image.

400.description: Failed to retrieve region snapshot list of image because of invalid at_status value.

401.description: Failed to retrieve region snapshot list of image because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to retrieve region snapshot list of image because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to retrieve region snapshot list of image because the image with image_id does not exist.

patch.description: Update image type of image. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is updating an image of their own, or (2) have `images.manage.all` permission and is updating an image that they are allowed to edit in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to be updated.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

image_tag_list.description: The list of tags this image is assigned with.

region_list.description: The list of regions in this image.

401.description: Failed to update image because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to update image because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to update image because the image with image_id or the image type with image_type_id does not exist.

patch.description: Update image status. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is updating an image of their own, or (2) have `images.manage.all` permission and is updating an image that they are allowed to edit in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to be updated.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

image_tag_list.description: The list of tags this image is assigned with.

region_list.description: The list of regions in this image.

400.description: Failed to update image because the status value provided is invalid.

401.description: Failed to update image because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to update image because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to update image because the image with image_id does not exist.

post.description: Add an image tag to an image. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is updating an image of their own, (2) have `images.verify` permission and is updating an image with PUBLISHED status that they are allowed to verify, or (3) have `images.manage.all` permission and is updating an image that they are allowed to edit in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to be updated.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

400.description: Failed to update image because the tag with image_tag_id cannot be assigned to image with image_id.

401.description: Failed to update image because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to update image because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to update image because the image with image_id or the tag with image_tag_id does not exist.

409.description: Failed to update image because the image with image_id already has the tag with image_tag_id.

delete.description: Remove an image tag from an image. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is updating an image of their own, (2) have `images.verify` permission and is updating an image with PUBLISHED status that they are allowed to verify, or (3) have `images.manage.all` permission and is updating an image that they are allowed to edit in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to be updated.

parameters.name: image_tag_id
parameters.description: The image tag to be removed.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

401.description: Failed to update image because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to update image because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to update image because the image with image_id or the tag with image_tag_id does not exist.

409.description: Failed to update image because the image with image_id does not have the tag with image_tag_id.

post.description: Add region to image. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is updating an image of their own, (2) have `images.verify` permission and is updating an image with PUBLISHED status that they are allowed to verify, or (3) have `images.manage.all` permission and is updating an image that they are allowed to edit in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to be updated.

holes.description: The holes inside the border of the region. Holes cannot intersect with each other, and cannot intersect with the border of the region.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

400.description: Failed to update image because the provided information does not satisfy the constraints.

401.description: Failed to update image because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to update image because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to update image because the image with image_id does not exist.

409.description: Failed to update image because the label with region_label_id cannot be assigned to image with image_id.

delete.description: Remove a region from an image. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is updating an image of their own, (2) have `images.verify` permission and is updating an image with PUBLISHED status that they are allowed to verify, or (3) have `images.manage.all` permission and is updating an image that they are allowed to edit in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to be updated.

parameters.name: region_id
parameters.description: The region to be removed.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

401.description: Failed to remove region because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to remove region because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to remove region because the image with image_id or the region with region_id does not exist.

patch.description: Update the boundary a region of an image. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is updating an image of their own, (2) have `images.verify` permission and is updating an image with PUBLISHED status that they are allowed to verify, or (3) have `images.manage.all` permission and is updating an image that they are allowed to edit in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to be updated.

parameters.name: region_id
parameters.description: The region to be updated.

holes.description: The holes inside the border of the region. Holes cannot intersect with each other, and cannot intersect with the border of the region.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

400.description: Failed to update image because the provided information does not satisfy the constraints.

401.description: Failed to update region because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to update region because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to update region because the image with image_id or the region with region_id does not exist.

patch.description: Update a region of an image. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is updating an image of their own, (2) have `images.verify` permission and is updating an image with PUBLISHED status that they are allowed to verify, or (3) have `images.manage.all` permission and is updating an image that they are allowed to edit in order to call this API successfully.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to be updated.

parameters.name: region_id
parameters.description: The region to be updated.

holes.description: The holes inside the border of the region. Holes cannot intersect with each other, and cannot intersect with the border of the region.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

400.description: Failed to update image because the provided information does not satisfy the constraints.

401.description: Failed to update region because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to update region because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to update region because the image with image_id or the region with region_id does not exist.

409.description: Failed to update image because the label with region_label_id cannot be assigned to image with image_id.

get.description: Get the list of operation logs of a region. User needs to either (1) have `images.manage.self` permission and is retrieving information about an image of their own, (2) have `images.verify` permission and is retrieving information about an image with PUBLISHED status that they are allowed to verify, or (3) have `images.manage.all` permission and is retrieving information about an image that they are allowed to manage in order to call this API successfully. Any field that is not provided in the request will not be updated.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to retrieve information.

parameters.name: region_id
parameters.description: The region to retrieve information.

200.description: Region operation log list retrieved successfully.

Set-Cookie.description: Renewed authentication token, if the user old token is about to expire.

401.description: Failed to update region because the user is not logged in.

403.description: Failed to update region because the user does not have the necessary permission.

404.description: Failed to update region because the image with image_id or the region with region_id does not exist.
